name: szenariendb_conversion
title: Conversion factors for common units and metrics
description: This table holds conversion factors of units and other metrics often used in energy and climate modelling.

sources.title: Energieeinheitenumrechner
sources.description: Conversion tool to convert various energy related units

sources.title: GWP and GTP with and without inclusion of climate–carbon feedbacks (cc fb) in response to emissions of the indicated non-CO2 gases
sources.description: Emission factors for conversion to CO2 equivalents

fields.name: multiply_factor
fields.description: factor to multiply start unit to obtain target units

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
